## Matrix3x3.(constructor)

Creates a Matrix3x3 initialized with values in an array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(elements: number[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  elements | number\[\] | Array that contains the values. |
